Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to contracts entered into by the Long Island Power Authority for emergency goods and services
Summary: Relates to contracts entered into by the Long Island Power Authority for emergency goods and services.
LawCode: Amd §§1020-b, 1020-f, 1020-cc & 1020-mm, Pub Auth L; amd §24, Exec L; amd §112, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, the executive law and the state finance law, in relation to contracts entered into by the Long Island Power Authority for emergency goods and services
